QuestData.Title: The Crucible of Carnage: Calder's Creation!
QuestData.Description: Grim and gory, this next match is sure to have the crowd groanin' one way or another. Calder Gray has been gathering the bodyparts of defeated challengers and building the perfect champion.$B$BThis thing is the ultimate cobbled collaboration of corpsified combatants. A magnificent mashup of mangled monstrosities. Are you ready to get messy?! Cause I am! Let me know when you're ready so we can get this thing started!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The gruesome assimilation of the crucible's previous combatants.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Wodin knows just how you like it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Crucible of Carnage and defeat the Cadaver Collage!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at the Crucible of Carnage in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Wow! When I saw that... thing stumble into the arena, I thought you didn't stand a chance. But you proved me wrong. You tore it apart!$B$BGrizzly business.
